channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling External Authentication Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling External Authentication Server

item.title: CVE-2013-0517|2024-08-06T14:25:10.436Z -- ibm -- sterling%20external%20authentication%20server
item.description: A Command Execution Vulnerability exists in IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 2.2.0, 2.3.01, 2.4.0, and 2.4.1 via an unspecified OS command, which could let a local malicious user execute arbitrary code.
